description: The FBI urges past victims of LockBit ransomware attacks to come forward after revealing that it has obtained over 7,000 LockBit decryption keys that they can use to recover encrypted data for free. [...]
title: FBI recovers 7,000 LockBit keys, urges ransomware victims to reach out

description: Google shared details on a recently introduced Chrome feature that changes how cookies are requested, with early tests showing increased performance across all platforms. [...]
title: Google Chrome reduced cookie requests to improve performance

description: Threat actors claim to be selling 3TB of data from Advance Auto Parts, a leading automotive aftermarket parts provider, stolen after breaching the company's Snowflake account. [...]
title: Advance Auto Parts stolen data for sale after Snowflake attack

description: Ariane Systems self check-in systems installed at thousands of hotels worldwide are vulnerable to a kiosk mode bypass flaw that could allow access to guests' personal information and the keys for other rooms. [...]
title: Check-in terminals used by thousands of hotels leak guest info

description: Club Penguin fans hacked a Disney Confluence server to steal information about their favorite game but wound up walking away with 2.5 GB of internal corporate data, BleepingComputer has learned. [...]
title: Club Penguin fans breached Disney Confluence server, stole 2.5GB of data

description: Chinese state-sponsored actors have been targeting a government agency since at least March 2023 in a cyberespionage campaign that researchers track as Crimson Palace [...]
title: Chinese hacking groups team up in cyber espionage campaign

description: A ransomware attack that hit pathology services provider Synnovis on Monday and impacted several major NHS hospitals in London has now been linked to the Qilin ransomware operation. [...]
title: Qilin ransomware gang linked to attack on London hospitals

description: Kali Linux has released version 2024.2, the first version of 2024, with eighteen new tools and fixes for the Y2038 bug. [...]
title: Kali Linux 2024.2 released with 18 new tools, Y2038 changes

description: Security researchers analyzing the relatively new RansomHub ransomware-as-a-service believe that it has evoloved from the currently defunct Knight ransomware project. [...]
title: RansomHub extortion gang linked to now-defunct Knight ransomware
